channel.title: Clicking a Object for a Item
channel.description: Ok, firstly it's been a LONG time since i've coded a rsps, and java sure as hell isn't my strongest point... i've spawned the object 'crate' and i want to make it so that when a character searched the crate they get a key in their inventory, i know the object id for the crate and the item id for the key, i'm just not sure how to do it? ... all help is appreciated. - thanks in advance

item.title: Clicking a Object for a Item
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

if (objectId == yourObjectId) { // Add item here }

Edit, did not see that it was answered, I should read replies.

Read full topic

@Team_Rocket wrote:

NieX:

cheers man, you’re such a help, i don’t have a skype atm… you have anything else? msn? fb? … it’d be good to have a chat with you, you seem to know your stuff.

No, sorry but I don’t. If you decide to install Skype, feel free to add me. I’m more than willing to help you.

item.title: Clicking a Object for a Item
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“NieX, post:3, topic:426235”]ah right, i’ll take a look… cheers pall, you’re a life saver
PI[/quote]

If you’re just getting back into working with RSPS, I highly recommend against using a base like PI. You may add my Skype, and I’ll help you if you still can’t find it. I’ll also recommend a good base for you to work with if you like. Skype: SpecialAgentJackBower

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking a Object for a Item
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

You can add this under the “First Click Object” packet. I’d post one for you, but my server is based on Shard Revolutions, and is radically different. Here’s what you’re going to be looking for, remember that It’s under the “Object First Click” packet:

switch(objectID) {
			case 26425:
			//yourcodegoeshere
			break;

EDIT: What base are you using?

Read full topic
